comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: nla.gov.au/nla.news-article71284593 - T&CJ March 1898...this looks like the same pic...whether it had been taken recently is unclear... Phizackerley appears to have had his bicycle shop at 61 Druitt St during the earlier 1890s...but by ca. 1898 he had moved to 379 George St...it is possible that Phizackerley's sign remained up after he moved...pending further info emerging, I wouldn't necessarily assume that the T&CJ pic had been taken recently.
